name: LDAK_SIMULATE
label: LDAK Simulate
shortDescription: Provides an unsophisticated SNP simulation solution.
longDescription: Creates genotypes assuming Linkage Equilibrium and Hardy Weinberg Equilibrium.

details.label: SNP simulation output
details.description: The name of the SNP data output file

details.label: number of SNPS
details.descriptions: The number of SNPS you want to simulate (default is 1,000,000 if no value is entered)

details.label: Number of samples
details.descriptions: Number of samples (default is 1000 if no value is specified)

details.label: minimum of Minor Allele Frequency range
details.descriptions: predictors with observed mean less than 2X this value will be inored, default value is 0.01 if none is specified)

details.label: maximum of Minor Allele Frequency range
details.descriptions: predictors with observed mean less than 2X this value will be inored (default value is 0.5 if none is specified, value must be in (0.01,0.5])

details.label: Phenotype output name
details.descriptions: The name of the file family that will contain the phenotype data generated by the simulation

details.label: The number of mutations effecting the phenotype
The amount of noise present in the data (0 to 1)
